<div>
<div style="text-align:center;padding:10px;">
<h2 id="neuro"><a href="http://neuroid.uprrp.edu/">NEURO-ID</a></h2>
Neuroscience Research Opportunity to Increase Diversity
</div>

![](statics/images/neuro-id-logo.png)

<p style="padding:10px;">NEURO-ID is a program designed to increase diversity in Neuroscience by providing opportunities to undergraduate students interested in this area and enhance their scientific knowledge, research capability and social responsibility.</p>

</div>

<div>
<div style="text-align:center;padding:10px;">
<h2 id="idgene"><a href="https://natsci.uprrp.edu/idgene/">ID-GENE</a></h2>
Increasing Diversity in Genomics for the Next Generation
</div>

![](Research_Programs/Photos/IDGENE.png){width=250px}

<p style="padding:10px;">Increasing Diversity in Genomics for the Next generation (IDGeNe) is a program from the University of Puerto Rico, Río Piedras Campus of the NIH-GREAT. The long-term goal of the IDGeNe program is to increase the diversity the will receive academic and professional training in genomics-related research.</p>

</div>

<div>
<div style="text-align:center;padding:10px;">
<h2 id="rise"><a href="http://brtc.uprrp.edu/rise/">RISE</a></h2>
Research Initiative for Scientific Enhancement
</div>

![](statics/images/rise.png){width=400px}

<p style="padding:10px;">The RISE Program is a research training program designed to increase the preparation and skills of undergraduate and graduate students. It seeks to increase the number of students who become interested and fully participate in productive research experiences in biomedical sciences encouraging them to continue doctoral degrees and postdoctoral experiences.</p>

</div>

<div>
<div style="text-align:center;padding:10px;">
<h2 id="prlsamp"><a href="https://prlsamp.upr.edu/">PR-LSAMP</a></h2>
PR-Louis Strokes Alliance for Minority Participation
</div>

![](Research_Programs/Photos/PR-LSAMP.png){width=400px}

<p style="padding:10px;">PR-LSAMP has been the main generator of institutional change among all members of the alliance in creating a genuine culture of undergraduate research and mentoring, therefore improving undergraduate STEM education.</p>

</div>

<div>
<div style="text-align:center;padding:10px;">
<h2 id="bdp"><a href="https://prlsamp.upr.edu/bridge-to-the-doctorate-program/">BDP</a></h2>
Bridge to Doctorate Program
</div>

![](Research_Programs/Photos/BDP.png){width=400px}

<p style="padding:10px;">The Bridge-to-the Doctorate Program (BDP) was established as a constituent of the Puerto Rico Louis Stokes Alliance for Minority Participation (PR-LSAMP) in August 2003. Its inception witnessed the bestowment of fellowships upon ten former undergraduate PR-LSAMP students, enabling them to pursue their initial two years of graduate studies at UPR-Río Piedras.</p>

</div>

<div>
<div style="text-align:center;padding:10px;">
<h2 id="rampup"><a href="https://natsci.uprrp.edu/ramp-up/">Ramp-Up</a></h2>
Research and Mentoring for Postbaccalaureates in Biological Sciences at UPR
</div>

![](Research_Programs/Photos/RampUp.png){width=400px}

<p style="padding:10px;">RaMP-UP Program focus is on the interphase between Biology and Computer Sciences, one of the fastest growing areas of biological research. The program provides the opportunity to gain meaningful experiences in research and professional development within a supportive research environment.</p>

</div>
